description: This file defines a Button component for a LightningJS application, implementing a focusable rectangle with a label that triggers a callback when clicked or focused.

methods.name: onInit
methods.description: Initializes the button state with props such as label, width, height, and onPress callback.

methods.name: onEnter
methods.description: Invokes the callback function when the button enters focus.

methods.name: onClick
methods.description: Invokes the callback function when the button is clicked.
